content: these adorable snow globe ornaments are perfect for those looking for a quick and simple holiday project make your snow globe unique by adorning it with your choice of decorative buttons or other embellishments **materials ** bernat super value yarn in cool blue berry red and white you could also use grey black brown or dark blue for the base size h crochet hook small tapestry needle or sewing needle christmas buttons this pattern gives instructions for snow globe ornaments in two sizes
